code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Button,TextField,MenuItem,Select,InputLabel,FormControl,DialogContent,DialogActions}from"@mui/material";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{saveDraft,clearDraft}from"../redux/orderSlice";import{createOrder}from"../services/api";import axios from"axios";import"./OrderForm.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrderForm=_ref=>{let{onCreate,onClose}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();const draft=useSelector(state=>state.order.draft);const[orderType,setOrderType]=useState(draft.orderType);const[customerName,setCustomerName]=useState(draft.customerName);const[createdByUserName,setCreatedByUserName]=useState(draft.createdByUserName);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError(null);if(!orderType||!customerName||!createdByUserName){setError("All fields are required");return;}try{const orderData={orderType,customerName,createdByUserName};console.log("Creating order with data:",orderData);await createOrder(orderData);onCreate();dispatch(clearDraft());onClose();}catch(error){console.error("Error creating order:",error);if(axios.isAxiosError(error)){var _error$response,_error$response$data;if((_error$response=error.response)!==null&&_error$response!==void 0&&(_error$response$data=_error$response.data)!==null&&_error$response$data!==void 0&&_error$response$data.errors){const validationErrors=error.response.data.errors;if(validationErrors.OrderType){setError("OrderType Error: ".concat(validationErrors.OrderType.join(", ")));}else{setError("Failed to create order.
